meanings.sent1: The rock candy was unchewable, so I had to suck on it instead.
meanings.sent2: The gum became unchewable after being left out in the sun for too long.
meanings.sent3: Trying to chew the unchewable taffy felt like attempting to bite into a rubber tire.
meanings.sent4: The unchewable steak seemed to mock my feeble attempts with each bite.
meanings.sent5: The unchewable plastic toy was a disappointment for the teething puppy.

meanings.sent1: The stale bread was unchewable, making it hard for the old man to eat.
meanings.sent2: The unchewable jerky was a challenge for even the strongest jaws.
meanings.sent3: The unchewable bubblegum turned into a sticky mess in my mouth.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like unchewable food for thought, hard to digest.
meanings.sent5: The unchewable gristle in the steak made it nearly inedible.
